project.name: Illuminated.js Docs
project.description: A 2D lights and shadows rendering engine for your HTML5 web applications and games.

illuminated.name: illuminated
illuminated.description:
Illuminated.js - A 2D lights and shadows rendering engine for HTML5
applications and games.

illuminated.Vec2.name: illuminated.Vec2
illuminated.Vec2.description:
Vec2 represents a 2d position or a 2d vector.
It is used everywhere in Illuminated.js.

Vec2 is based on Box2dâ€™s Vec2 except that in Illuminated.js a Vec2
vector is immutable. It means every method creates a new Vec2 instance and
you can safely use a same Vec2 instance everywhere because the immutability
guarantees that properties will not be modified.

params.name: x
params.description: X coordinate for the vector.

params.name: y
params.description: Y coordinate for the vector.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this light.

props.name: position
props.description: Position of this light. (0,0) by default.

props.name: distance
props.description: Intensity of this light.

props.name: diffuse
props.description: How diffuse this light is.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this opaque object.

props.name: diffuse
props.description: How diffuse this opaque object should be.

illuminated.Lamp.name: illuminated.Lamp
illuminated.Lamp.description:
A circular light rendered as a radial gradient. Lamps can also be "oriented"
in a specific direction.
example:
new Lamp({
      position: new Vec2(12, 34),
      distance: 100,
      diffuse: 0.8,
      color: 'rgba(250,220,150,0.8)',
      radius: 0,
      samples: 1,
      angle: 0,
      roughness: 0
    })

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this lamp.

props.name: position
props.description: Position of this lamp. (0,0) by default.

props.name: distance
props.description: Intensity of this lamp.

props.name: diffuse
props.description: How diffuse this lamp is.

props.name: color
props.description:
The color emitted by
the lamp. The color can be specified in any CSS format.

props.name: radius
props.description:
The size of the lamp. Bigger lamps cast
smoother shadows.

props.name: samples
props.description:
The number of points which will be used
for shadow projection. It defines the quality of the rendering.

props.name: angle
props.description: The angle of the orientation of the lamp.

props.name: roughness
props.description: The roughness of the oriented effect.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this disc object.

props.name: center
props.description: Position of the disc object.

props.name: radius
props.description: Size of the disc object.

props.name: diffuse
props.description: How diffuse this disc object should be.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this disc object.

props.name: points
props.description:
An array of
{{#crossLink "illuminated.Vec2"}}{{/crossLink}} points that define the polygon.

props.name: diffuse
props.description: How diffuse this polygon object should be.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this rectangle object.

props.name: topleft
props.description: A vector that is the top-left of the rectangle.

props.name: bottomright
props.description: A vector that is the bottom-right of the rectangle.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this line object.

props.name: a
props.description: A vector that is the first point of the line.

props.name: b
props.description: A vector that is the last point of the line.

illuminated.Lighting.name: illuminated.Lighting
illuminated.Lighting.description: Defines the lighting of one light through a set of opaque objects.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this light.

props.name: light
props.description: The source of the lighting.

props.name: objects
props.description:
An array of 
{{#crossLink "illuminated.OpaqueObject"}}{{/crossLink}} objects which stop the
light and create shadows.

illuminated.DarkMask.name: illuminated.DarkMask
illuminated.DarkMask.description:
Defines the dark layer which hides the dark area not illuminated by a set of
lights.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be applied to this light.

props.name: lights
props.description:
An array of
{{#crossLink "illuminated.Light"}}{{/crossLink}} objects that illuminate the
rest of the scene.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the dark area in RGBA format.

classitems.description: X coordinate for the vector.
classitems.name: x

classitems.description: Y coordinate for the vector.
classitems.name: y

classitems.description: Returns a copy of this vector.
classitems.name: copy

return.description: A new vector that is a copy of this vector.

classitems.description: Calculates the dot product of this vector and the given vector.
classitems.name: dot

params.name: v
params.description: A vector with which to calculate the dot product.

return.description: The result of the dot product.

classitems.description: Subtracts the given vector from this vector.
classitems.name: sub

params.name: v
params.description: A vector to subtract from this vector.

return.description: A new vector that is the result of the subtraction.

classitems.description: Adds the given vector to this vector.
classitems.name: add

params.name: v
params.description: A vector to add to this vector.

return.description: A new vector that is the result of the addition.

classitems.description: Multiplies the given vector with this vector.
classitems.name: mul

params.name: v
params.description: A vector to multiply with this vector.

return.description: A new vector that is the result of the multiplication.

classitems.description: Returns the inverse of this vector.
classitems.name: inv

return.description: A new vector that is the inverse of this vector.

classitems.description: Calculates the squared distance between this vector and the given vector.
classitems.name: dist2

params.name: v
params.description: A vector with which the squared distance is calculated.

return.description: The squared distance.

classitems.description: Calculates the normalized form of this vector.
classitems.name: normalize

return.description: A new vector in normalized form.

classitems.description: Calculates the squared length of this vector.
classitems.name: length2

return.description: The squared length.

classitems.description: Returns a string representing this vector.
classitems.name: toString

return.description: A string representing this vector.

classitems.description: Determines if this vector is within the bounds defined by the given vectors.
classitems.name: inBound

params.name: topleft
params.description: A vector that is the top-left of the bounds.

params.name: bottomright
params.description: A vector that is the bottom-right of the bounds.

return.description: True if this vector is within the given bounds.

return.description:
An anonymous object with the properties topleft and

of the boundary.

classitems.description:
Return the center of this light.
i.e. The position where the light intensity is the highest

return.description: A new vector that represents the center of this light.

Function to be called for every sample. The function will
be passed a vector representing the position of the sample.

classitems.description: Draw a path defined by the given points onto the given ctx.
classitems.name: path

params.name: ctx
params.description:
The context onto which the properties
should be drawn.

params.name: points
params.description:
An array of
{{#crossLink "illuminated.Vec2"}}{{/crossLink}} objects that define the path.

params.name: dontJoinLast
params.description:
True if the last point should joined with the
first point in the path.

classitems.description: Converts a CSS color string into RGBA format.
classitems.name: getRGBA

params.name: color
params.description: Color in any CSS format.

params.name: alpha
params.description: Alpha value for produced color.

return.description: Color in RGBA format.

classitems.description:
Converts a CSS color string into an anonymous object with color and alpha
properties.
classitems.name: extractColorAndAlpha

params.name: color
params.description: Color in any CSS format.

return.description:
An anonymous object with the properties color and alpha.
The color property is a string in hex format and the alpha property is a
number from 0.0 to 1.0, rounded to 3 decimal places.

classitems.description: Merges the properties from the given parameters into the first parameter.
classitems.name: extend

params.name: mergeInto
params.description: An object to merge into.

params.name: mergeFrom
